comments.body:
Not ideal but hey, it is Google, we cannot really expect them to make OSS life easy right ;-p
(Sorry for the rant, just packaged jax/jaxlib from Google and it was a terrible experience.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@source:
  # We have to use git as the source as the provided tarballs are not stable.
  git_url: https://gn.googlesource.com/gn
  git_rev: 579b5b394094db3a07c46c3ee459860bd5619224
  patches:
